basics.name: Rina Ogino
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences and a Minor in Japanese in the Department of East Asian Languages and Literatures at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.company: College of Natural Sciences Student Academic Success Center
highlights: Maintain and update website, social media, calendar, and weekly newsletters
Respond to students' questions or concerns in an efficient and appropriate manner
Greet and help students with navigating the academic support in need
Manage and secure confidential student information in the database
Implement the integration of all books into the RFID system

awards.title: Charles R. Hemenway Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to undergraduate students with great weight in character and qualities of good citizenship, as well as academic merit, a minimum overall GPA of 3.0.

awards.title: W. Wesley and Hiromi Peterson Student Support Endowment
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to a student enrolled in a degree program in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa College of Natural Sciences for the purpose of encouraging and recognizing excellence in research and scholarship, a minimum overall GPA of 3.5.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
